title: Did Mitch McConnell say he'd support Trump in 2024 as Vice President General?
subtitle: During his appearance on Fox News, Mr. Mitch McConnell seemed to indicate that he would support the former President if he ran again.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: United States Senate minority leader Mitch McConnell said, "Sure," when asked if he would support former President Donald Trump if he was a Republican candidate in 2024.
